channel.title: I'm a dumbass and need help please
channel.description:
I have a really quick question that I know will be dumb. But my stupid ass can't figure it out... how do I submit content to the Steam Workshop? I've never had any interest in submitting my own content before. So that's why I don't know. Please forgive my stupidity.
P.S If it's done through hammer, that would explain why I don't know. The modifications I've made are all retrofitting (combining the old with the new) the modern BM sounds.

item.title: I'm a dumbass and need help please
item.dc:creator: BuzzKillington
item.description:
I knew it would be simple X( ugh,

Thanks for the help man.

Read full topic
